enhanced_description: Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest IT and business consulting services firms globally. We offer comprehensive, scalable, and sustainable IT and business consulting services, distinguished by an insights-driven and outcomes-based approach designed to accelerate returns on investment. Operating across 21 industries from 400 locations worldwide, our services are informed by global expertise and delivered locally. Within the HR domain, CGI specializes in talent management, recruiting, workforce management, and HR consulting, aiming to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and enable organizations to hire top talent faster and more efficiently. Our practitioners leverage a range of appropriate methods and standards, including design thinking, lean, agile, DevSecOps, and change leadership, with a strong focus on measurable outcomes.
